targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "autogen"."l7_client.avg_ssl_handshakes_new" WHERE ("avicontroller" =~ /^$device$/ AND "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$environment$/ AND "se_name" =~ /^$serviceengine$/ AND "metric_type" = 'virtualservice_metrics_per_serviceengine') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "l4_client.avg_complete_conns" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Per VS - Client Side Open Conns - Top10

list.name: environment
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "environment" WHERE location =~ /$location/

list.name: device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "avicontroller" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/

list.name: serviceengine
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "se_name" WHERE location =~ /$location/ AND environment =~ /$environment/ AND avicontroller =~ /$device/
